original_text:
Forbidden Dragon
Benvenuto nella mistica e mitica Cina con la slot gratis Forbidden Dragons prodotta dal provider WMS.  Graficamente questo gioco con un motore Colossal Reel riprende il colore oro in tutta la schermata, evidenziando i tratti dei draghi posizionati di lato al tempio sacro. Continua a leggere la mia recensione per sfruttare tutte le funzionalità extra proposte da questa solenne slot orientale!
Gameplay di Forbidden Dragons
Il gameplay funziona perfettamente su qualsiasi dispositivo. Disponibile per giocare da 50 centesimi a 100 euro a giro su tutte e 100 le linee di pagamento, questa meravigliosa slot sfrutta al meglio il suo insolito layout per darti l’opportunità di vincere importi considerevoli. Con il trasferimento di jolly e giri gratuiti, il motore di gioco Colossal Reel offre opportunità di vittorie davvero colossali. L’interfaccia utente è chiara e ben strutturata, quindi è facile accedere alle opzioni di autoplay, alle informazioni sulla tabella dei pagamenti e alle regole di gioco. C’è anche una colonna sonora molto cinematografica che ti coinvolge nel gameplay per un’esperienza molto coinvolgente. L’RTP teorico offerto è del 95,91%, che è un rapporto di pagamento ragionevole per questo stile di gioco. Come le altre slot Colossal Reel, la volatilità è alta, il che la rende ideale per i giocatori a cui piace l’adrenalina di grandi rischi e grandi vincite.
Quali sono i simboli presenti sulla tabella dei pagamenti?
Ci sono i soliti reali dei quattro semi delle carte da gioco.  A loro si uniscono alcuni simboli cinesi molto tradizionali:

Il Leone di giada protettore del successo e prosperità
Longmu, la madre dei draghi
L’imperatore Qin Shi Huang, che mostra a Longmu doni d’oro e di giada
Il Drago Rosso ricorda il Fucanglong, il drago guardiano dei tesori nascosti
Il Drago verde è Dilong, protettore della Terra
Il Drago Barbuto che potrebbe essere il Re Drago Ao Guang, che rappresenta il massimo potere, forza e buona fortuna.

Come si vince alla slot Forbidden Dragons?
Con 100 linee di pagamento distribuite sui 2 set di rulli, una griglia 5×4 e la Colossal Reel con il suo layout 5×12, ci sono più opportunità per creare combinazioni di 3 o più simboli su una linea di pagamento. Ogni combinazione vincente legge da sinistra a destra dal rullo più a sinistra. I simboli che pagano di più sono il Re Drago e il Drago Verde, che consegnano vincite di 5x e 4x rispettivamente sulla tua linea, quando ottieni 5 simboli su una linea vincente: tutti i pagamenti sono in moltiplicatori, quindi ovviamente più è alta la puntata, più grande è il ritorno. Sebbene i rendimenti individuali possano non essere enormi, giocare su 100 linee di pagamento crea molte opportunità per ottenere più vincite e pagamenti maggiori.
Quali sono le Funzionalità Bonus in questo gioco?
Costruita da WMS sul motore di gioco Colossal Reels, in questa slot ci sono bonus da sfruttare sia nel gameplay di base che con giri gratuiti. Vediamoli insieme:

Trasferimento di jolly – il simbolo Yin e Yang è il jolly in questo slot e sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli tranne il bonus. Ruota 4 simboli in pila sul set più piccolo di rulli e si trasferiranno nella stessa posizione sul set più grande creando molte possibilità di vincita. Prima che avvenga una rotazione, alcune delle posizioni adiacenti su ciascuna bobina possono essere riempite con simboli casuali per formare combinazioni vincenti aggiuntive;
Bonus di Giri Gratuiti – il simbolo Testa di Drago è il bonus e tre o più di esso attivano la funzione giri gratuiti. Questo simbolo appare sui rulli 1, 3 e 5 sui rulli standard e Colossal. Fai atterrare tra 3 e 6 scatter ovunque in vista per ottenere i seguenti premi:


3 simboli: 8 giri gratuiti e 2x moltiplicatore
4 simboli: 12 giri gratuiti e 5x moltiplicatore
5 o 6 simboli: 20 giri gratuiti e 20x moltiplicatore

Proprio come nel gioco base, i simboli casuali occuperanno le posizioni dei rulli adiacenti e le vincite sul set di rulli Colossal sono soggette a un moltiplicatore aggiuntivo di 25x. Sblocca le funzionalità bonus tra cui il jolly e lo scatter e potresti giocare per 2.500 volte la tua linea scommessa su ogni giro gratuito!
Il mio verdetto finale su Forbidden Dragons
Forbidden Dragons è un altra slot WMS che utilizza il motore di gioco Colossal Reels per offrire il potenziale per vittorie colossali. Inutile dire che questa slot sfrutta al massimo il suo tema cinese per coprire i rulli con simboli realizzati in modo molto fedele alle illustrazioni originali legate alla fortuna. Come ti ho già anticipato in precedenza si tratta di una slot  altamente volatile, quindi dovrai essere paziente se vorrai ottenere i bonus dei giri gratuiti. Se ami il motore di gioco Colossal Reel, tornerai a giocare con questa slot diverse volte per cercare maggiori vincite dai bonus, proprio come ho fatto io!

FAQS più frequenti su Forbidden Dragons

Certo che puoi! Su Slotjava, abbiamo una raccolta di slot demo, tra cui quelle di WMS cliccabili dal pratico menù a tendina.



La slot Forbidden Dragons include giri gratuiti?

La funzione giri gratuiti in questa slot è la più redditizia del gioco, arriva a premiare fino a 20 giri gratuiti con un moltiplicatore 20x, più un moltiplicatore 5x extra per le vincite di Colossal Reel.

Se giochi in uno dei nostri casinò online ADM, puoi giocare a questa slot per ottenere premi in denaro. Dai un'occhiata alle nostre recensioni approfondite sui casinò per scegliere quello che ha il bonus di benvenuto più conveniente!

raw_translation.response:
Welcome to the mystical and mythical China with the free slot Forbidden Dragon produced by the provider WMS. Graphically, this game with a Colossal Reel engine takes on the gold color across the screen, highlighting the features of the dragons positioned on the side of the sacred temple. Keep reading my review to take advantage of all the extra features offered by this solemn eastern slot!

Gameplay of Forbidden Dragon
The gameplay works perfectly on any device. Available to play from 50 cents to 100 euros per spin on all 100 paylines, this wonderful slot makes the most of its unusual layout to give you the opportunity to win considerable amounts. With the transfer of wilds and free spins, the Colossal Reel game engine offers truly colossal winning opportunities. The user interface is clear and well-structured, so it's easy to access autoplay options, paytable information, and game rules. There is also a very cinematic soundtrack that engages you in gameplay for a very immersive experience. The theoretical RTP offered is 95.91%, which is a reasonable payout ratio for this style of game. Like other Colossal Reel slots, the volatility is high, making it ideal for players who enjoy the adrenaline of big risks and big wins.

What are the symbols on the paytable?
There are the usual royals of the four playing card suits. They are joined by some very traditional Chinese symbols:

The Jade Lion protector of success and prosperity
Longmu, the mother of dragons
Emperor Qin Shi Huang, who shows Longmu gold and jade gifts
The Red Dragon reminiscent of Fucanglong, the guardian dragon of hidden treasures
The Green Dragon is Dilong, protector of the Earth
The Bearded Dragon may be the Dragon King Ao Guang, representing ultimate power, strength, and good luck.

How to win at Forbidden Dragon slot?
With 100 paylines spread across 2 sets of reels, a 5×4 grid and the Colossal Reel with its 5×12 layout, there are more opportunities to create combinations of 3 or more symbols on a payline. Each winning combination reads from left to right from the leftmost reel. The highest paying symbols are the Dragon King and the Green Dragon, which deliver 5x and 4x wins respectively on your line when you get 5 symbols on a winning line: all payouts are in multipliers, so obviously the higher the bet, the bigger the return. Although individual returns may not be huge, playing on 100 paylines creates many opportunities to get more wins and bigger payouts.

What are the Bonus Features in this game?
Built by WMS on the Colossal Reel game engine, there are bonuses to be exploited both in the base gameplay and with free spins in this slot. Let's take a look at them together:

Wild Transfer - Yin and Yang is the wild symbol in this slot and replaces all other symbols except the bonus. Spin 4 symbols in a stack on the smaller set of reels and they will transfer to the same position on the larger set, creating many winning possibilities. Before a rotation occurs, some of the adjacent positions on each reel can be filled with random symbols to form additional winning combinations;
Free Spins Bonus - The Dragon Head symbol is the bonus and three or more of it activates the free spins feature. This symbol appears on reels 1, 3 and 5 on the standard and Colossal reels. Land between 3 and 6 scatter symbols anywhere in view to receive the following prizes:


3 symbols: 8 free spins and 2x multiplier
4 symbols: 12 free spins and 5x multiplier
5 or 6 symbols: 20 free spins and 20x multiplier

Just like in the base game, random symbols will occupy adjacent reel positions and wins on the Colossal Reel set are subject to an additional 25x multiplier. Unlock bonus features including wilds and scatters and you could play for 2,500 times your line bet on each free spin!

My final verdict on Forbidden Dragon slot
Forbidden Dragon is another WMS slot that uses the Colossal Reels game engine to offer the potential for colossal wins. Needless to say, this slot makes the most of its Chinese theme to cover the reels with symbols made very faithful to the original illustrations related to luck. As I already mentioned earlier, it is a highly volatile slot, so you will need to be patient if you want to get the free spins bonus. If you love the Colossal Reel game engine, you will come back to play this slot several times to look for greater wins from the bonuses, just like I did!

Of course, you can! On Slotjava, we have a collection of demo slots, including those from WMS clickable from the handy dropdown menu.

Does Forbidden Dragon slot include free spins?

The free spins feature in this slot is the most profitable in the game, reaching up to rewarding up to 20 free spins with a 20x multiplier, plus an extra 5x multiplier for Colossal Reel wins.

Can I win real money playing Forbidden Dragon slot?

If you play at one of our ADM online casinos, you can play this slot to win cash prizes. Check out our in-depth casino reviews to choose the one with the most convenient welcome bonus!

message.content:
Welcome to mystical and mythical China with the free slot game Forbidden Dragon produced by the esteemed provider WMS. Graphically, this game featuring a Colossal Reel engine takes on the color of gold on the entire screen, highlighting the features of the dragons positioned on both sides of the sacred temple. Read on below for my review to take advantage of all the extra features offered by this grand oriental slot game!

Gameplay of Forbidden Dragons
The gameplay works seamlessly on any device. Available to play from 50 cents to 100 euros per spin across all 100 paylines, this wonderful slot game makes the most of its unusual layout to give you the opportunity to win significant amounts. With the transfer of wilds and free spins, the Colossal Reel game engine offers truly colossal opportunities for big wins. The user interface is clear and well-structured, making it easy to access autoplay options, paytable information, and game rules. There’s also a very cinematic soundtrack that immerses you in the gameplay for a very engaging experience. The theoretical RTP offered is 95.91%, which is a reasonable payout ratio for this type of game. Like the other Colossal Reel slots, volatility is high, making it ideal for players who enjoy the adrenaline rush of big risks and big wins.

What symbols are present on the paytable?
There are the usual royal symbols of the four playing card suits. These are joined by some very traditional Chinese symbols:

The jade lion protector of success and prosperity.
Longmu, the mother of dragons.
Emperor Qin Shi Huang, who shows Longmu gifts of gold and jade.
The Red Dragon reminiscent of the Fucanglong, the guardian dragon of hidden treasures.
The Green Dragon is Dilong, protector of the Earth.
The Bearded Dragon who could be the Dragon King Ao Guang, representing ultimate power, strength, and good fortune.

How do you win at Forbidden Dragons?
With 100 paylines spread across the 2 sets of reels, a 5x4 grid and the Colossal Reel with its 5x12 layout, there are more opportunities to create combinations of 3 or more symbols on a payline. Each winning combination reads from left to right from the leftmost reel. The highest paying symbols are the Dragon King and Green Dragon, which deliver payouts of 5x and 4x respectively on your line when you get 5 symbols on a winning line: all payouts are in multipliers, so obviously the larger the bet, the bigger the return. Although individual returns may not be enormous, playing on 100 paylines creates many opportunities to get more wins and bigger payouts.

What are the bonus features in this game?
Built by WMS on the Colossal Reels game engine, there are bonuses to be had both in the base gameplay and with free spins. Let's take a look at them:

Wild transfer - the Yin and Yang symbol is the wild in this slot and replaces all other symbols except the bonus. Spin 4 symbols stacked on the smaller set of reels and they will transfer to the same position on the larger set, creating many opportunities to win. Before a rotation happens, some of the adjacent positions on each reel may be filled with random symbols to form additional winning combinations;
Free Spins Bonus - the Dragon Head symbol is the bonus and three or more of it activate the free spins feature. This symbol appears on reels 1, 3, and 5 on both the standard and Colossal reels. Land between 3 and 6 scatters anywhere on view to get the following prizes:


3 symbols: 8 free spins and 2x multiplier.
4 symbols: 12 free spins and 5x multiplier.
5 or 6 symbols: 20 free spins and 20x multiplier.

Just like in the base game, random symbols will occupy the positions of the adjacent reels and wins on the Colossal Reel set are subject to an additional 25x multiplier. Unlock the bonus features including wild and scatter and you could play for 2,500 times your line bet on each free spin!

My final verdict on Forbidden Dragons
Forbidden Dragons is another WMS slot that uses the Colossal Reels game engine to offer the potential for colossal wins. Needless to say, this slot makes the most of its Chinese theme, covering the reels with symbols rendered very faithfully to the original illustrations related to fortune. As I mentioned earlier, it is a highly volatile slot, so you will need to be patient if you want to get the free spins bonuses. If you love the Colossal Reel game engine, you will come back to play this slot several times to seek greater wins from the bonuses, just like I did!

Most Frequently Asked Questions about Forbidden Dragons
Can I play Forbidden Dragons slot for free?

Of course you can! At Slotjava, we have a collection of demo slots, including those from WMS which can be played from our handy drop-down menu.

Does the Forbidden Dragons slot include free spins?

The free spins feature in this slot is the most profitable of the game, it gets up to 20 free spins with a 20x multiplier, plus an extra 5x multiplier for the Colossal Reel wins.

Can I win real money playing Forbidden Dragons slots?

If you play in one of our ADM online casinos, you can play this slot to win cash prizes. Take a look at our in-depth casino reviews to choose the one that has the most convenient welcome bonus for you!

Gameplay of Forbidden Dragons
The gameplay works seamlessly on any device. Available to play from 50 cents to 100 euros per spin across all 100 paylines, this wonderful slot game makes the most of its unusual layout to give you the opportunity to win significant amounts. With the transfer of wilds and free spins, the Colossal Reel game engine offers truly colossal opportunities for big wins. What symbols are present on the paytable?
There are the usual royal symbols of the four playing card suits. These are joined by some very traditional Chinese symbols:

The jade lion protector of success and prosperity.
Longmu, the mother of dragons.
Emperor Qin Shi Huang, who shows Longmu gifts of gold and jade.
The Red Dragon reminiscent of the Fucanglong, the guardian dragon of hidden treasures.
The Green Dragon is Dilong, protector of the Earth.
The Bearded Dragon who could be the Dragon King Ao Guang, representing ultimate power, strength, and good fortune.

How do you win at Forbidden Dragons?
With 100 paylines spread across the 2 sets of reels, a 5x4 grid and the Colossal Reel with its 5x12 layout, there are more opportunities to create combinations of 3 or more symbols on a payline. Each winning combination reads from left to right from the leftmost reel. The highest paying symbols are the Dragon King and Green Dragon, which deliver payouts of 5x and 4x respectively on your line when you get 5 symbols on a winning line: all payouts are in multipliers, so obviously the larger the bet, the bigger the return. Although individual returns may not be enormous, playing on 100 paylines creates many opportunities to get more wins and bigger payouts.

What are the bonus features in this game?
Built by WMS on the Colossal Reels game engine, there are bonuses to be had both in the base gameplay and with free spins. Let's take a look at them:

Wild transfer - the Yin and Yang symbol is the wild in this slot and replaces all other symbols except the bonus. Spin 4 symbols stacked on the smaller set of reels and they will transfer to the same position on the larger set, creating many opportunities to win. Before a rotation happens, some of the adjacent positions on each reel may be filled with random symbols to form additional winning combinations;
Free Spins Bonus - the Dragon Head symbol is the bonus and three or more of it activate the free spins feature. This symbol appears on reels 1, 3, and 5 on both the standard and Colossal reels. Land between 3 and 6 scatters anywhere on view to get the following prizes:


3 symbols: 8 free spins and 2x multiplier.
4 symbols: 12 free spins and 5x multiplier.
5 or 6 symbols: 20 free spins and 20x multiplier.

Just like in the base game, random symbols will occupy the positions of the adjacent reels and wins on the Colossal Reel set are subject to an additional 25x multiplier. Unlock the bonus features including wild and scatter and you could play for 2,500 times your line bet on each free spin!
